  • Home
  • About Us
  • Who we are
  • Our Awards and Recognition

A leader in the healthcare industry.

We apply our nearly 100 years of experience and expertise to reduce the total cost of healthcare and to improve the lives of patients. Through this work, we're proud to share some recent accolades we've earned to help establish Cardinal Health as a leader in the healthcare industry. 

Our Awards and Recognition

Jump to : Diversity and Inclusion  |  Business Innovation  |  Supply Chain Logistics  |  Environmental Sustainability

Diversity and Inclusion

Best Places to Work for LGBT Equality

Human Rights Campaign

2018, 2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2009

Honors companies based on HRC’s Corporate Equality Index, in which Cardinal Health earned a top score of 100%. This is a national benchmarking tool on corporate policies and practices pertinent to lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer employees.

Visit website

100 Best Companies

Working Mother magazine

2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012

Flexible work, paid leave, support for women's advancement and more — these best companies are helping women thrive.

Visit website

2015 Employer Support Freedom Award

Secretary of Defense

2015

Secretary of Defense Employer Support Freedom Award, the highest honor the department gives to employers for support of National Guard and Reserve employees.

Visit website

2015 Best Practices Company for Community Commitment

Asia Society

2015, 2011

Honor employers at the forefront of promoting and developing Asian Pacific American (APA) leaders and giving back to their community.

Visit website

50 Out Front Best Places for Women & Diverse Managers To Work

Diversity MBA magazine

2015

Showcases companies with accountability, succession planning, representation, recruitment, workplace inclusion and retention, and board diversity to advance women and people of color into senior leadership positions.

Visit website

Corporate 101: America's Most Admired Corporations for Supplier Diversity

Minority Business News

2016, 2015

Recognizes companies for a demonstrated commitment to growing and developing minority-owned enterprises.

Top 60 Company for Executive Women

National Association for Female Executives

2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012

Recognizes companies that recruit and hire women, offer  advancement programs and flexible schedules to ensure they keep moving up the ladder while pursuing personal interests, and support their efforts to reach executive and profit-and-loss positions.

Visit website

2020 Women on Boards

2020 Women on Boards "W" Company

2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012, 2011 

A national campaign to increase the percentage of women on U.S. company boards to 20% or greater by the year 2020.

Visit website

America’s Top 50 Inclusion Corporations

Omnikal (formerly DiversityBusiness.com)

2017, 2016

Recognizes corporations' commitment to inclusion throughout the nation's business community and contributions to this growing economic sector.

Visit website

America’s Best Employers

Forbes

2017

Annual ranking of both best large and mid-sized employers in America based on their commitment to employee growth and satisfaction.

Visit website

 

 

Business Innovation

Workforce 100

Workforce magazine

2016

The Workforce 100 recognizes excellence in multiple human resources-related areas such as recruiting, learning, leadership and diversity.

Visit website

Best Companies for Leaders

Chief Executive magazine

2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012

Chief Executive seeks to identify  world-class companies that excel in leadership development.

Visit website

Pillar Award for Community Service

Medical Mutual of Ohio and Smart Business magazine

2016, 2013

Honors businesses of all types and sizes that make outstanding contributions to their communities to encourage a charitable environment, recognize creative efforts that make a difference and demonstrate ties between for-profit and nonprofit worlds.

Visit website

World's Most Admired Companies

Fortune

2017, 2016, 2015

The Most Admired list is the definitive report card on corporate reputations.

Visit website

Best Employers for Healthy Lifestyle Gold Award

National Business Group on Health

2015, 2014

Recognizes the best workforce well-being programs in the US particularly those with a holistic approach to well-being, including financial, emotional, social, and community. 

Visit website

150 Top Places to Work in Healthcare

Becker's Healthcare

2017, 2016, 2015, 2014

The list features U.S. healthcare provider organizations, as well as other types of healthcare-specific companies. 

Visit website

Best Employers for Healthy Lifestyle Platinum Award

National Business Group on Health

2014, 2013, 2012, 2011

Recognizes the best workforce well-being programs in the US particularly those with a holistic approach to well-being, including financial, emotional, social, and community. 

Visit website

Most Honored Companies

Institutional Investor Magazine

2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013

Celebrates the U.S. companies who ranked at the top of their All America Executive Team ranking for their corporate leadership and investor relations expertise as voted on by the buy- and sell-side analyst community.

Visit website

Distribution Management Award

Healthcare Distribution Alliance

2017

Awardees demonstrate the value of distribution by developing creative, results-oriented initiatives that set the standard for excellence in the healthcare industry.

Visit website

BCA 10 Awards

Business Committee for the Arts

2017

Honors 10 U.S. companies for exceptional commitment to the arts through grants, local partnerships, volunteer programs, matching gifts, sponsorships and board membership.

Visit website


Supply Chain Logistics

Superior Supplier

Defense Logistics Agency (DLA)

Gold: 2016
Silver: 2017

The DLA is the Department of Defense's (DoD) largest logistics combat support agency, providing worldwide logistics support in both peacetime and wartime to the military services as well as several civilian agencies and foreign countries. The recognition is part of the DoD’s Superior Supplier Incentive Program, which recognizes the department’s top performing supply contractors. 

Visit website

America's Leading 3PLS

Global Trade magazine and Armstrong & Associates

2017, 2016, 2015

Companies named are impressive in their scope, abilities and the value they bring to the U.S. shippers who read Global Trade magazine.

Visit website

Top 100 3PL Provider

Inbound Logistics magazine

2017, 2016, 2015, 2014, 2013

Honors the top 3PL companies, including well-known companies, a smattering of 3PL niche providers, and newer companies offering specialized logistics services.

Visit website

Healthcare Supply Chain Top 25 Ranking

Gartner, Inc.

No. 1 spot: 2014, 2013, 2012, 2011
No. 2 spot: 2016, 2015

Honors companies that best exemplify the demand-driven ideal for today's supply chain and document their best practices, which can help all companies move closer to their demand-driven goals.

Visit website


Environmental Sustainability

Newsweek Green Rankings: Top Green Companies in the U.S.

Newsweek

2016, 2015, 2014

One of the world’s most recognized assessments of corporate environmental performance, and features eight indicators that are used to assess and measure the environmental performance of the world’s largest publicly traded companies.

Visit website

Dow Jones Sustainability Index

Dow Jones

2016, 2015, 2014, 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2009, 2008, 2007, 2006 

A family of indices evaluating the sustainability performance of the largest 2,500 companies listed on the Dow Jones Global Total Stock Market Index.

Visit website

digest: Cardinal Health is honored by the awards and recognitions we’ve received. These awards represent some of the business, industry and community accolades the teams have earned.
important_content: Looking for other brands we carry?
